Quality standard: Air-dried; free of mold; free of noxious weeds
Remarks: Subject to wind blowing unless anchored; cover about 90% of soil surface

Quality standard: Green or air-dried burred wood fiber
Remarks: Decomposes slowly; subject to blowing unless anchored; packaged in 80-90 lb bales

Quality standard: Partially digested wood fiber; usually with green dye and a dispersing agent
Remarks: Apply with hydroseeder; used as an anchoring material for mulches subject to blowing

Quality standard: Undyed, unbleached plain weave; warp 78 ends/yd; weft 41 ends/yd; 60-90 lb rolls
Application rate: 48 in by 50 yd or 48 in by 75 yd
Remarks: Use without additional mulch; secure as per manufacturers' specification

Quality standard: Interlocking web of excelsior fibers with photodegradable plastic netting
Application rate: 48- by 100-in 2-sided plastic or 48- by 180- in 1-sided plastic
Remarks: Use without additional mulch; secure as per manufacturers' specification

Mulch material: Straw or coconut or combined mats
Quality standard: Photodegradable plastic net on one or two sides
Remarks: Designed to withstand fiber individually specific water velocities
